title: Epic 30: AI Receptionist Agent
description: Autonomous AI receptionist that handles phone calls, schedules appointments, answers patient questions, and manages the front desk workflow 24/7. Reduces staff burden and ensures no call goes unanswered.

userStories.title: AI receptionist schema
userStories.description: Create database models for AI receptionist conversations and actions.
acceptanceCriteria: AIConversation model with patientId, channel (phone/chat/sms), transcript, status
AIAction model with conversationId, actionType, parameters, result, confidence
AIEscalation model with conversationId, reason, assignedTo, resolvedAt
AIKnowledgeBase model for FAQ and practice information
AIVoiceConfig model with voice settings, greeting, hold music

userStories.title: Voice AI integration
userStories.description: Integrate with voice AI platform for phone call handling.
acceptanceCriteria: Twilio Voice + OpenAI Realtime API integration
Natural voice synthesis with configurable voice
Call transfer to human when needed

userStories.title: Appointment scheduling agent
userStories.description: AI agent that books, reschedules, and cancels appointments.
acceptanceCriteria: Offer alternative times if preferred unavailable
Collect patient information for new patients
Send confirmation via patient's preferred method

userStories.title: FAQ and information agent
userStories.description: AI agent that answers common patient questions.

userStories.title: Patient identification
userStories.description: Identify callers and retrieve their information.
acceptanceCriteria: Caller ID lookup for existing patients
Create new patient record during call

userStories.title: Smart escalation
userStories.description: Intelligently escalate to human staff when needed.
acceptanceCriteria: Patient request for human triggers immediate transfer

userStories.title: Multi-channel support
userStories.description: Handle conversations across phone, chat, and SMS.

userStories.title: AI receptionist dashboard
userStories.description: Dashboard for monitoring and configuring AI receptionist.
